title: I Take Too Long To Join My Games Sometimes
body: I sometimes freeze and then get in the game, or I get disconnected mid-load. But by the time I get to load they've already remade the game. What can I do to solve this?

replies.body:
This sounds like your network is having a hard time talking with the game servers once you start loading into the match. Sometimes your own home network can be in tip top shape but still have difficulty communicating with certain servers. 

Look over our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can get to the root cause why you're getting disconnected. Hit me back up if you're still having problems!
